name: Shamim
reviewss: Canon Eos 4000D 18MP 2.7inch Display With 18-55mm Lens Dslr Camera is of very good quality. Still doing a lot better. But The quality should have been better considering the Price.

name: Shanto
reviewss: canon eos800d is a best dslr.beacuse this camera price is so good and camera quality 100%% ok..video and photo so good.i think this camera bit canon 80d,77d,200d.that's why its a very good camera.But i think price is too much i wish you can get low the price.i think 420000tk is a best deal.

name: Rasel Rana
reviewss: I had a difficult time finding support for my GeoVision CCTV system. Finally, I turned to CCTV Camera Pros. First, it started with an hour of consulting support online. Then, Farryl, a support engineer sold me a couple of cameras that I installed. They were fantastic and of of course you get free online support for the products.

name: Jackson
reviewss: I bought a camera that would be compatible with my older security dvr. The camera works great. I was happy that I received a specs sheet for installing it myself. I got an email from someone in the company asking me about my experience. Very happy with the product and customer service. I plan to buy more from them!!!

name: Stephen
reviewss: I needed to upgrade our older CCTV system for our concert halls and decided to call different dealers using the internet as a source. When I called CCTV Camera Pros, they knew exactly what I was looking for. They analyzed my need and offered the right solution. The cameras and controller they sold us are top notch. I installed everything myself. The difference in clarity and color is astounding. They gave us a good price, shipped it right away, and to the right address. We buy a lot of stuff from a lot of people. These guys are the real deal.

name: Charles
reviewss: I spent 27 years in the FBI and was involved in my share of CCTV surveillance applications and monitoring. Without question, the guys at CCTV Camera Pros are as technically qualified at setting up CCTV systems and interoperability over the Internet as anyone I used to work with. They hung by me during some trying times as a result of a camera factory defect until we got it right. The 16 camera residential system I have, would rival any government installation for video quality. I highly recommend the guys at CCTV Camera Pros for their after sales technical support which is so important in todays systems.
